Class MeleeEnemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameEntity
      • Enemy
        • MeleeEnemy

  • public class MeleeEnemy
extends Enemy
    One of the enemies whose behavior has certain common traits from the enemy class , but otherwise has its own characteristic behavior. code TBD

    sumukhipandey

    • Constructor Detail

      • MeleeEnemy

        public MeleeEnemy(int damage,
                  double x,
                  double y,
                  double speed,
                  int maxHealth)
        Creates a custom MeleeEnemy object with a weapon, specific velocity at location x,y.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of this enemy.
        y - the x coordinate of this enemy.
        speed - how fast the enemy can move.
        maxHealth - the maxHealth value of this MeleeEnemy
        damage - the damage dealt by this MeleeEnemy

        Parameters:

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer,
                 processing.core.PImage eUp,
                 processing.core.PImage eDown,
                 processing.core.PImage eRight,
                 processing.core.PImage eLeft)
        Draws the instances that pertain to a MeleeEnemy object
        Parameters:
        drawer - the object used to draw the Melee enemy on the screen
        eUp - the up facing image of this MeleeEnemy
        eDown - the down facing image of this MeleeEnemy
        eRight - the right facing image of this MeleeEnemy
        eLeft - the left facing image of this MeleeEnemy
